title: How to Restart Mighty Monsters

steps.headline: Press the “Home” or “back” button on your device.
steps.description: This closes Mighty Monsters temporarily, and sometimes helps resolve freezing issues.

steps.headline: Force-close the Mighty Monsters app.
steps.description:
This forces Mighty Monsters to end all its processes so you can relaunch the game. Android: Go to Settings > Applications > Application Manager, select “Mighty Monsters,” then tap “Force Close.”
iOS: Tap on the Home button two times quickly, swipe left to view all apps, then swipe up on the Mighty Monsters app preview.

steps.headline: Restart your iOS or Android device.
steps.description: This force-closes all apps, reboots your device, and ends freezing problems associated with the Mighty Monsters app.

steps.headline: Uninstall and reinstall the Mighty Monsters app.
steps.description:
This helps resolve freezing problems related to a corrupt install, and deletes all game progress by default. Android: Go to Settings > Application Manager, tap on “Mighty Monsters,” then tap “Uninstall.”
iOS: Tap and hold the Mighty Monsters app icon until all icons start wiggling, then tap “x,” followed by “Delete.”

steps.headline: Launch the Mighty Monsters app on your device.
Tap “Menu” at the bottom right corner of the Mighty Monsters Home screen.
Tap “Settings,” then tap “Reset Character.” This deletes all game progress, and forces you to start over from the beginning.
Type the word “reset” into the text field displayed on-screen.
steps.description: This confirms you want to reset all game progress.

steps.headline: Tap “OK,” then exit the Mighty Monsters app.
steps.description: Your character and game progress is now reset, and you can restart Mighty Monsters from the very beginning.

text:
Correcting Freezing Problems Press the “Home” or “back” button on your device. This closes Mighty Monsters temporarily, and sometimes helps resolve freezing issues. Force-close the Mighty Monsters app. This forces Mighty Monsters to end all its processes so you can relaunch the game. Android: Go to Settings > Applications > Application Manager, select “Mighty Monsters,” then tap “Force Close.”
iOS: Tap on the Home button two times quickly, swipe left to view all apps, then swipe up on the Mighty Monsters app preview. Restart your iOS or Android device. This force-closes all apps, reboots your device, and ends freezing problems associated with the Mighty Monsters app. Uninstall and reinstall the Mighty Monsters app. This helps resolve freezing problems related to a corrupt install, and deletes all game progress by default. Android: Go to Settings > Application Manager, tap on “Mighty Monsters,” then tap “Uninstall.”
iOS: Tap and hold the Mighty Monsters app icon until all icons start wiggling, then tap “x,” followed by “Delete.” Resetting Your Character Launch the Mighty Monsters app on your device.  Tap “Menu” at the bottom right corner of the Mighty Monsters Home screen.  Tap “Settings,” then tap “Reset Character.” This deletes all game progress, and forces you to start over from the beginning.  Type the word “reset” into the text field displayed on-screen. This confirms you want to reset all game progress. Tap “OK,” then exit the Mighty Monsters app. Your character and game progress is now reset, and you can restart Mighty Monsters from the very beginning.
